impact_summary: Known as 'Ghoda Pur'. Severe disruption, massive property damage. Water reached Kala Ghoda statue.
affected_areas: Entire city inundated, Old City, Sayajigunj

impact_summary: Major urban flooding. Power/Transport disrupted. 17.8M people affected across state.
affected_areas: Sayajigunj, Fatehgunj, Parsuram Bhattha, Low-lying slums

cause: Ajwa Reservoir Overflow (Highest level 215.5 ft recorded)
impact_summary: Surprise flood in Sept despite dry monsoon. Ajwa Dam overflowed due to upstream rain.

cause: Cloudburst-like Rainfall (424mm in 6 hrs) + Dam Overflow
impact_summary: Severe flash flood. Airport closed. Crocodiles entered streets. Waist-deep water.
affected_areas: Sayajigunj, Sama, Harni, Warasia, Karelibaug, Hospitals, Zoo

cause: Torrential Rain + Vishwamitri Breaching Danger Mark
impact_summary: Water level 9 ft above danger mark. Widespread inundation surpassing 2005 levels.
affected_areas: Harni, Sama-Savli, Akota, Mujmahuda, Vadsar, Kalali, Siddharth Nagar
